description:
A massive rock blocks the way out of the Southern Palace.  Only by combining the powers of General and Lord can Ryouun and Sonshin hope to move it.  Hakuanshin waits outside for the palace to collapse, because when it does he will get the last bit of Kanu`s card.  Can they escape the collapsing palace in time? And if they do, what will be their next destination?
Source: crunchyroll
